import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import products from '../products'; import Rating from './components/rating'; import { Button, Card, Col, Image, ListGroup, Row } from './react-bootstrap'; import { useParams } from './react-router-dom'; export const ProductScreen = () => { const { id:productId } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === productId) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: ${product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Out of stock'} ) }
